column5: Located in the Barracks Townhome Community, just 2.5 miles from the Texas A&M Campus, this beautiful townhome features three bedrooms, each with their own private bath, (two furnished). The home boasts lovely stained concrete floors in all common areas and carpet in the bedrooms. The space is furnished but is soon to be Updated in May 2017 with new bedspreads, and accessories. This home has cable, wifi, basic appliances and small, fenced back yard.
